Sept. 4, 1897 D Brechin Contest
Brechin Contest 10 Test Piece Contest Brechin Contest brechin-contest
None
Great Britain
Brechin Public Park, Brechin, Angus, Scotland, UK Source: The Dundee Courier & Argus (Dundee, Scotland), Monday, September 06, 1897; pg. 5; Issue 13788.
Best Soprano Cornet: A. Hutton, Brechin Best Cornet: S. Cowieson, Brechin Best Euphonium: David Lamb, Brechin Best Trombone: Mr. Steele, Brechin
This was the third in a series of four 1897 contests for the championship of the newly-formed Forfarshire Amateur Brass Band Association. Brechin City were the overall champions.
March 8, 2012, 3:52 p.m. March 8, 2012, 4:29 p.m.
1 Brechin City Richard Marsden
2 Arbroath Instrumental Friend Farrand
3 St. Margaret's Old (Dundee) George Millar
4 Forfar Instrumental John Lamb
